original_title: Universal Studios Florida: Experience the Magic of Movies
overview: This extraordinary video captures all the highlights of your exciting visit to Universal Studios Florida in the early 1990's. Host John Forsythe brings you classic moments on rides such as Terminator 2 3D, Barney, ET Adventure, Back To The Future- The Ride, Earthquake- The Big One, Jaws- The Great White Terror, and much, much more!
title: Universal Studios Florida: Experience the Magic of Movies
